name: Document Translation (Arabic To English)
description: Translate a PDF file in Arabic to English.

appStages.name: Introduction
DocumentTranslation
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eDocument Translation\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n  \r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Select and upload the PDF file you wish to translate from your local system. Press \u0027Translate\u0027 to begin the translation process. The translated content can be downloaded for later use.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload a File",
      "description": "Upload a PDF file with Arabic content",
      "customClass": "icon-green transparent m-4",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "fileMinSize": "1KB",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Columns",
              "columns": [
                {
                  "components": [],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                },
                {
                  "components": [
                    {
                      "label": "Columns",
                      "columns": [
                        {
                          "components": [],
                          "width": 6,
                          "offset": 0,
                          "push": 0,
                          "pull": 0,
                          "size": "md",
                          "currentWidth": 6
                        },
                        {
                          "components": [
                            {
                              "label": "Columns",
                              "columns": [
                                {
                                  "components": [
                                    {
                                      "label": "Upload",
                                      "action": "event",
                                      "showValidations": false,
                                      "theme": "info",
                                      "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
                                      "tableView": false,
                                      "key": "upload",
                                      "logic": [
                                        {
                                          "name": "Enable Button",
                                          "trigger": {
                                            "type": "javascript",
                                            "javascript": "result \u003d (data[\u0027file\u0027].length);"
                                          },
                                          "actions": [
                                            {
                                              "name": "Enable Button",
                                              "type": "property",
                                              "property": {
                                                "label": "Disabled",
                                                "value": "disabled",
                                                "type": "boolean"
                                              },
                                              "state": false
                                            }
                                          ]
                                        }
                                      ],
                                      "type": "button",
                                      "event": "upload",
                                      "input": true,
                                      "keyModified": true
                                    }
                                  ],
                                  "width": 6,
                                  "offset": 0,
                                  "push": 0,
                                  "pull": 0,
                                  "size": "md",
                                  "currentWidth": 6
                                },
                                {
                                  "components": [
                                    {
                                      "label": "Translate",
                                      "action": "event",
                                      "showValidations": false,
                                      "theme": "info",
                                      "customClass": "float-right rounded",
                                      "tableView": false,
                                      "key": "translate",
                                      "properties": {
                                        "successMessage": "Translation is Completed"
                                      },
                                      "type": "button",
                                      "event": "execute",
                                      "input": true
                                    }
                                  ],
                                  "width": 6,
                                  "offset": 0,
                                  "push": 0,
                                  "pull": 0,
                                  "size": "md",
                                  "currentWidth": 6
                                }
                              ],
                              "key": "columns3",
                              "type": "columns",
                              "input": false,
                              "tableView": false
                            }
                          ],
                          "width": 6,
                          "offset": 0,
                          "push": 0,
                          "pull": 0,
                          "size": "md",
                          "currentWidth": 6
                        }
                      ],
                      "key": "columns6",
                      "type": "columns",
                      "input": false,
                      "tableView": false
                    }
                  ],
                  "width": 6,
                  "offset": 0,
                  "push": 0,
                  "pull": 0,
                  "size": "md",
                  "currentWidth": 6
                }
              ],
              "customClass": "m-1",
              "key": "columns",
              "type": "columns",
              "input": false,
              "tableView": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns8",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Destination Path",
      "hidden": true,
      "tableView": true,
      "defaultValue": "data/data-org/GENAI/GenAI-Applications/Document-Translation",
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "destinationPath",
      "type": "textfield",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "key": "fieldSet2",
      "type": "fieldset",
      "label": "Field Set",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "components": [
        {
          "label": "Translated Content",
          "autoExpand": false,
          "customClass": "text-blue transparent m-4",
          "tableView": true,
          "key": "genAiResponse",
          "logic": [
            {
              "name": "Clears1",
              "trigger": {
                "type": "event",
                "event": "upload"
              },
              "actions": [
                {
                  "name": "clear1datas",
                  "type": "value",
                  "value": "value\u003d\u0027\u0027"
                }
              ]
            }
          ],
          "type": "textarea",
          "rows": 5,
          "input": true
        },
        {
          "label": "Columns",
          "columns": [
            {
              "components": [],
              "width": 6,
              "offset": 0,
              "push": 0,
              "pull": 0,
              "size": "md",
              "currentWidth": 6
            },
            {
              "components": [
                {
                  "label": "Download",
                  "action": "event",
                  "showValidations": false,
                  "theme": "info",
                  "rightIcon": "fa fa-download",
                  "customClass": "float-right rounded m-2",
                  "tableView": false,
                  "key": "download",
                  "properties": {
                    "exportFrom": "genAiResponse",
                    "exportAs": "pdf"
                  },
                  "logic": [
                    {
                      "name": "Enable",
                      "trigger": {
                        "type": "javascript",
                        "javascript": "result \u003d (data[\u0027genAiResponse\u0027].length)"
                      },
                      "actions": [
                        {
                          "name": "Enable button",
                          "type": "property",
                          "property": {
                            "label": "Disabled",
                            "value": "disabled",
                            "type": "boolean"
                          },
                          "state": false
                        }
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "name": "setExpoxtTextFlagLogic",
                      "trigger": {
                        "type": "event",
                        "event": "expoxt-text"
                      },
                      "actions": [
                        {
                          "name": "setExpoxtTextFlagAction",
                          "type": "value",
                          "value": "data[\u0027txtReadFileFlag\u0027] \u003d data[\u0027textField2\u0027];\r\ndata[\u0027txtUploadDataFlag\u0027] \u003d data[\u0027textField2\u0027];\r\ndata[\u0027txtGenAiFlag\u0027] \u003d data[\u0027textField2\u0027];\r\ndata[\u0027txtExecuteFlag\u0027] \u003d data[\u0027textField2\u0027];\r\ndata[\u0027txtTextDiffFlag\u0027] \u003d data[\u0027textField2\u0027];\r\ndata[\u0027txtExpoxtTextFlag\u0027] \u003d data[\u0027textField1\u0027];\r\ndata[\u0027toggle\u0027]\u003dfalse;\r\ndata[\u0027textField4\u0027]\u003ddata[\u0027textField2\u0027];"
                        }
                      ]
                    }
                  ],
                  "type": "button",
                  "event": "export-text",
                  "input": true
                }
              ],
              "width": 6,
              "offset": 0,
              "push": 0,
              "pull": 0,
              "size": "md",
              "currentWidth": 6
            }
          ],
          "customClass": "text-right",
          "key": "columns10",
          "type": "columns",
          "input": false,
          "tableView": false
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "LLM Model",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "gemini-1.5-flash-001",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "model",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true,
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Max Tokens",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "16000",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "max_tokens",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true,
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "hidden": true,
      "key": "columns4",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Temperature",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "0.2",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "temperature",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true,
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "hidden": true,
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Prompts",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": {
                "user": true
              },
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "You are a helpful assistant who must translates the given content (Arabic):\\n {pdfFileContent} \\n to English.",
                  "value": "user",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "prompts",
              "type": "selectboxes",
              "input": true,
              "inputType": "checkbox",
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 12,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 12
        },
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 0,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 0
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html6",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline  mt-0 float-left rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns5",

      "tableView": false
    }
  ]
}
